languages.text: {n}Мужчина разражается хохотом.{/n} "Кто о чем, а {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}законник о десятине{/d}! Ох, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}, мои миры все равно приносят податей больше, чем ты за всю свою жизнь видел{mf||а}. Так что я могу делать что хочу — и буду".

{n}Calligos bursts into laughter.{/n} "Of course, a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}{mf|lawman|lawwoman}{/d}'s sole topic of conversation is the tithe! I'll have you know, new blood, that my worlds still bring in more tithes than you have seen in your whole life. So I can do as I well please — and so I will."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина разражается хохотом.{/n} "Кто о чем, а {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}законник о десятине{/d}! Ох, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}, мои миры все равно приносят податей больше, чем ты за всю свою жизнь видел{mf||а}. Так что я могу делать что хочу — и буду".

languages.text: {n}Calligos éclate de rire.{/n} « Évidemment, aux yeux d'{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}{mf|un homme de loi|une femme de loi}{/d}, seule importe la dîme ! Pour votre gouverne, jeune {mf|parvenu|parvenue}, ma planète est capable de fournir une dîme qui dépasse tous les trésors que vous avez jamais vus. Alors, je m'estime en droit de faire ce qu'il me plaît. Et je ne m'en prive pas. »
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos bursts into laughter.{/n} "Of course, a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}{mf|lawman|lawwoman}{/d}'s sole topic of conversation is the tithe! I'll have you know, new blood, that my worlds still bring in more tithes than you have seen in your whole life. So I can do as I well please — and so I will."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos éclate de rire.{/n} « Évidemment, aux yeux d'{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}{mf|un homme de loi|une femme de loi}{/d}, seule importe la dîme ! Pour votre gouverne, jeune {mf|parvenu|parvenue}, ma planète est capable de fournir une dîme qui dépasse tous les trésors que vous avez jamais vus. Alors, je m'estime en droit de faire ce qu'il me plaît. Et je ne m'en prive pas. »

languages.text: {n}カリゴスは笑い声をあげた。{/n}「もちろんだ。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}法執行官{/d}の唯一の話題は租税のことばかりだな！覚えておけ、新入り。俺の惑星群は、お前が一生で見てきた以上の租税を今なおもたらしている。だから俺は好きなように振る舞えるし、そうするつもりだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos bursts into laughter.{/n} "Of course, a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}{mf|lawman|lawwoman}{/d}'s sole topic of conversation is the tithe! I'll have you know, new blood, that my worlds still bring in more tithes than you have seen in your whole life. So I can do as I well please — and so I will."

traits.locale_text: {n}カリゴスは笑い声をあげた。{/n}「もちろんだ。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}法執行官{/d}の唯一の話題は租税のことばかりだな！覚えておけ、新入り。俺の惑星群は、お前が一生で見てきた以上の租税を今なおもたらしている。だから俺は好きなように振る舞えるし、そうするつもりだ」

languages.text: {n}Calligos kahkahalara boğuluyor.{/n} "Bir {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}kanuncunun{/d} bahsini açacağı tek konu aşar olur tabii! Sana şunu diyeyim taze kan, benim dünyalarım senin ömrün boyunca gördüğünden daha fazla aşar ödüyor. Canım ne isterse onu yaparım, yapacağım da."
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos bursts into laughter.{/n} "Of course, a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}{mf|lawman|lawwoman}{/d}'s sole topic of conversation is the tithe! I'll have you know, new blood, that my worlds still bring in more tithes than you have seen in your whole life. So I can do as I well please — and so I will."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos kahkahalara boğuluyor.{/n} "Bir {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}kanuncunun{/d} bahsini açacağı tek konu aşar olur tabii! Sana şunu diyeyim taze kan, benim dünyalarım senin ömrün boyunca gördüğünden daha fazla aşar ödüyor. Canım ne isterse onu yaparım, yapacağım da."

languages.text: {n}Calligos echa a reír.{/n} «¡Claro que {mf|un|una} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}{mf|defensor|defensora} de la ley{/d} solo sabe hablar del diezmo! Para que le quede claro, sangre fresca, mis mundos siguen pagando más en diezmo de lo que usted ha visto en toda su vida. Así que puedo hacer lo que me plazca, y eso haré».
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos bursts into laughter.{/n} "Of course, a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}{mf|lawman|lawwoman}{/d}'s sole topic of conversation is the tithe! I'll have you know, new blood, that my worlds still bring in more tithes than you have seen in your whole life. So I can do as I well please — and so I will."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos echa a reír.{/n} «¡Claro que {mf|un|una} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}{mf|defensor|defensora} de la ley{/d} solo sabe hablar del diezmo! Para que le quede claro, sangre fresca, mis mundos siguen pagando más en diezmo de lo que usted ha visto en toda su vida. Así que puedo hacer lo que me plazca, y eso haré».

languages.text: {n}卡里戈斯突然哈哈大笑起来。{/n}“我就知道，只要{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}法务官{/d}开了口，聊的肯定是什一税！有件事情你得明白，新来的。我的世界缴纳的什一税，比你这辈子见过的都多，所以我想怎么做就可以怎么做，就是这样。”
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos bursts into laughter.{/n} "Of course, a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}{mf|lawman|lawwoman}{/d}'s sole topic of conversation is the tithe! I'll have you know, new blood, that my worlds still bring in more tithes than you have seen in your whole life. So I can do as I well please — and so I will."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡里戈斯突然哈哈大笑起来。{/n}“我就知道，只要{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}法务官{/d}开了口，聊的肯定是什一税！有件事情你得明白，新来的。我的世界缴纳的什一税，比你这辈子见过的都多，所以我想怎么做就可以怎么做，就是这样。”

languages.text: {n}Calligos lacht laut auf.{/n} "Natürlich redet {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}{mf|ein Gesetzeshüter|eine Gesetzeshüterin}{/d} über nichts anderes als den Zehnt! Ich muss Euch sagen, neues Blut, dass meine Welten immer noch einen höheren Zehnt abwerfen, als Ihr je gesehen habt. Ich kann also tun, was ich will ... und das werde ich auch."
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos bursts into laughter.{/n} "Of course, a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}{mf|lawman|lawwoman}{/d}'s sole topic of conversation is the tithe! I'll have you know, new blood, that my worlds still bring in more tithes than you have seen in your whole life. So I can do as I well please — and so I will."

Ich muss Euch sagen, neues Blut, dass meine Welten immer noch einen höheren Zehnt abwerfen, als Ihr je gesehen habt. Ich kann also tun, was ich will ... und das werde ich auch."
